name: buywander-monorepo
description: BuyWander Deal Hunter - Better Auth + FastAPI + Vue 3

scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:auth && pnpm run lint:frontend && pnpm run lint:backend
scripts.format: pnpm run format:auth && pnpm run format:frontend && pnpm run format:backend
scripts.format:check: pnpm run format:check:auth && pnpm run format:check:frontend && pnpm run format:check:backend
scripts.type-check: pnpm run type-check:auth && pnpm run type-check:frontend
scripts.install:all: cd auth-server && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
